userStories.title: Create mod extraction script
acceptanceCriteria: Extract modifications array from each build
Use category_detector.py for categorization if needed
Output to mods.json with build_id reference
userStories.notes: Created extract_mods.py that reads builds.json and extracts mods with build_id references.

userStories.title: Execute mod extraction and update sources.json
userStories.notes: 47 mods extracted (all Engine category - Hennessey packages). Source marked COMPLETED.
